thread.title: Quiet area of Paris to rest your head
thread.title_full: Quiet area of Paris to rest your head - Review of Hotel Relais Bosquet Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jheonl
title: Quiet area of Paris to rest your head
text: Rooms are a nice size, clean and have comfy beds. The only thing I could complain about would be the noise from neighbours and the hall. The walls are thin so even just people in passing seemed to be loud from our room. Excellent value here and I would recommend this hotel to others who just want to relax and rest their heads after exploring Paris! Lots to eat nearby but the neighbourhood seemed very quiet after dinner hour.
